p: Umifenovir is an antiviral agent that has been used for influenza treatment and has shown activity against SARS-CoV in vitro [ 7, 39]. Its activity against SARS-CoV-2 was investigated recently at a dose of 200 mg every 8 h in combination with Lopinavir/Ritonavir in a retrospective cohort Chinese study [ 39]. Results showed better clinical response in the combination group in comparison with the Lopinavir/Ritonavir monotherapy group. Umifenovir is currently being tested in seven randomized trials for the treatment of COVID-19 [ 38].
